sections.Biography:
===[[Season 4]]===
He is one of the older slaves in [[Meereen]] and has experienced two slaves revolts. He is unwilling to take part in the revolt in favor of [[Daenerys Targaryen|Daenerys]] because he thinks all revolts end the same way - with slavers victorious and slaves punished. They are, however, persuaded by [[Grey Worm]] and take up arms against their masters.<ref>"[[Oathkeeper]]"</ref>
